metadata.title: CVE-2024-39468 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:smb: client: fix deadlock in smb2_find_smb_tcon()Unlock cifs_tcp_ses_lock before calling cifs_put_smb_ses() to avoid suchdeadlock.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
